Introduction

X4 (Korean: 엑스포; Japanese: エキスポ) is a co-ed project Kpop group that consists of Arin, Somi, Zion.T and Wonstein. They made their debut with “Present” in July 11, 2022. The project group is created for the 2030 Busan World Expo.

Current state:
disbanded
